{% extends "templates/end_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon::meta" %} {% set library_name = "Metaprogramming" %} {% set item_name = "value_list" %} {% set end_name = "size" %} {% set templates = "" %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.overload_set([ " template [[nodiscard]] static constexpr auto get() noexcept; " ])}}

Returns the value at index N. This function is ill-formed if N < size().

{{macros.function_stats( [], "The value at index N", "This function never throws exceptions", "Constant." )}} {{macros.example_code( " import cmoon.meta; int main() { using tl = cmoon::meta::value_list<1, 2, 3, 4>; static_assert(tl::get<0>() == 1); static_assert(tl::get<1>() == 2); static_assert(tl::get<2>() == 3); static_assert(tl::get<3>() == 4); } " )}} {% endblock %}
